original_title: ‘Mephedrone’ drug discovered for the first time in Sri Lanka - Senior DIG Southern Province
original_body_lines: The report by the Government Analyst revealed that the substance recovered from a foreigner from Moldova arrested in Weligama on 21 September is an empathogen-stimulant drug ‘Mephedrone’.
The drug is more dangerous than other narcotic drugs such as ‘Ice’ and detected for the first time in Sri Lanka, according to Kithsiri Jayalath, Senior DIG, Southern Province.
